alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lafayette; Pontotoc; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:11PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafayette, northwestern Chickasaw, eastern Yalobusha, Calhoun and southwestern Pontotoc Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 510 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Banner, or 8 miles southeast of Water Valley, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Water Valley, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Pyland, Randolph, Banner, Paris, Tula, Algoma, Toccopola, Robbs, Thorn, Reid, Loyd, Ellard, Pannell and Tyson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
